document_data.name: Threena Cormaeril
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Threena Cormaeril''' was a member of the [[Cormaeril]] noble house of [[Cormyr]] who married [[Lord Dheolur]] in order to spy on the house for King [[Duar Obarskyr]]. She married King Duar{{Cite dragon/279/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Treasures of Cormyr, Part 2|83}} sometime after he slew her husband for treason.
